posts.post_content: Posted By: T206Collector Cards are guaranteed to grade with JSA, PSA/DNA or any other respected grading company. The Bridwell is one of my dupes from the Jeff Morey collection, which you can hear/read about on my website. The Jones is from the Pittsburgh-based pre-war autograph collection that was sold in small chunks on ebay during 2007. I am looking for $300 each, but would do $550 for the pair. If you're interested in either or both, email: SignedT206@gmail.com http://picasaweb.google.com/pmifsud3d/MoreyT205/photo?authkey=XzonIhFOLDY#5149740799696340706">

Posted By: T206Collector
Bump for addition of asking price.

Will take $300 each or $550 for the pair.  Any lower and I'd be paying you to take the cards from me.  [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]
